item.title: Kungsleden T -1 days - Finalizing the equipment
item.description: Equipment for the Kungsleden For this year i wanted to put everything into a lighterpack and i really did it ðŸ¥³ This is mostly for myself and should help me in the future to optimize the weight. Lighterpack Base weight could definitely be better and we are considering a ZPacks triplex for the future. But this is a topic for another day. How does all this stuff look like? I captured two pictures of my equipment, one shows most of the stuff just loose.
